# please create `CMakeListsUser.txt` in the root of project.
# The `CMakeListsUser.txt` will not be overwritten by PlatformIO.



set(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES "nodemcuv2;esp01_1m_full;esp07;d1_mini;heltec_wifi_kit_8;h803wf;esp32dev;esp32_eth;esp32s2_saola;esp8285_4CH_MagicHome;esp8285_4CH_H801;esp8285_5CH_H801;d1_mini_5CH_Shojo_PCB;d1_mini_debug;d1_mini_ota;anavi_miracle_controller;wemos_shield_esp32;m5atom;sp501e;sp511e;travis_esp8266;travis_esp32;codm-controller-0.6;codm-controller-0.6-rev2;elekstube_ips;" CACHE STRING "Build Types reflect PlatformIO Environments" FORCE)


SET(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/bin/xtensa-lx106-elf-gcc")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/bin/xtensa-lx106-elf-g++")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "-fno-rtti -std=c++11 -Os -mlongcalls -mtext-section-literals -falign-functions=4 -U__STRICT_ANSI__ -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -fno-exceptions -Wall")
SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "-std=gnu99 -Wpointer-arith -Wno-implicit-function-declaration -Wl,-EL -fno-inline-functions -nostdlib -Os -mlongcalls -mtext-section-literals -falign-functions=4 -U__STRICT_ANSI__ -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -fno-exceptions -Wall")

SET(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 99)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "nodemcuv2")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ESP8266_NODEMCU')
    add_definitions(-D'MQTT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE=1024')
    add_definitions(-D'SECURE_CLIENT=SECURE_CLIENT_BEARSSL')
    add_definitions(-D'BEARSSL_SSL_BASIC')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0')
    add_definitions(-D'NDEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'_IR_ENABLE_DEFAULT_=false')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_HASH=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_NEC=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SONY=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SAMSUNG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_LG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_USE_MY_CONFIG')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'FP_IN_IROM')
    add_definitions(-D'PIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_ESPRESSIF_SDK22x_190703')
    add_definitions(-D'PIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_LWIP_HIGHER_BANDWIDTH')
    add_definitions(-D'VTABLES_IN_FLASH')
    add_definitions(-D'MIMETYPE_MINIMAL')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_RELEASE_NAME=ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_VERSION=0.13.0-b3')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=80000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'__ets__')
    add_definitions(-D'ICACHE_FLASH')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BOARD=\"PLATFORMIO_NODEMCUV2\"')
    add_definitions(-D'FLASHMODE_DOUT')
    add_definitions(-D'LWIP_OPEN_SRC')
    add_definitions(-D'NONOSDK22x_190703=1')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wled00")

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nodemcuv2/ESP Async WebServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Hash/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nodemcuv2/ESPAsyncTCP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WiFi/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nodemcuv2/IRremoteESP8266/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nodemcuv2/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPI")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/h803wf/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "d1_mini_ota")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ESP8266_WEMOS_D1MINI')

    add_definitions(-D'SECURE_CLIENT=SECURE_CLIENT_BEARSSL')
    add_definitions(-D'BEARSSL_SSL_BASIC')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0')
    add_definitions(-D'NDEBUG')

    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_NEC=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SONY=true')

    add_definitions(-D'VTABLES_IN_FLASH')

    add_definitions(-D'BTNPIN=34')

    add_definitions(-D'TFT_HEIGHT=240')

    add_definitions(-D'TFT_DC=25')
    add_definitions(-D'TFT_RST=26')

    add_definitions(-D'WLED_VERSION=0.13.0-b3')

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/tools/sdk/include/xtensa-debug-module")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/tools/sdk/include/esp-face")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/tools/sdk/include/esp32-camera")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/tools/sdk/include/fb_gfx")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/cores/esp32")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/variants/esp32")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/SPIFFS/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/elekstube_ips/AsyncTCP@1.1.1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/AzureIoT/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/BLE/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/BluetoothSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/ESP32/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/FFat/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/HTTPClient/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/HTTPUpdate/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/HTTPUpdateServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/NetBIOS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/Preferences/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/SD/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/SD_MMC/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/SimpleBLE/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/Ticker/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/WiFiClientSecure/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/WiFiProv/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/xtensa-esp32-elf/include/c++/5.2.0")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/xtensa-esp32-elf/include/c++/5.2.0/xtensa-esp32-elf")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/lib/gcc/xtensa-esp32-elf/5.2.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/lib/gcc/xtensa-esp32-elf/5.2.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/xtensa-esp32-elf/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32s2/xtensa-esp32s2-elf/include/c++/8.4.0")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32s2/xtensa-esp32s2-elf/include/c++/8.4.0/xtensa-esp32s2-elf")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32s2/lib/gcc/xtensa-esp32s2-elf/8.4.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32s2/lib/gcc/xtensa-esp32s2-elf/8.4.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32s2/xtensa-esp32s2-elf/include")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/elekstube_ips/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "d1_mini_debug")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ESP8266_WEMOS_D1MINI')
    add_definitions(-D'MQTT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE=1024')
    add_definitions(-D'SECURE_CLIENT=SECURE_CLIENT_BEARSSL')
    add_definitions(-D'BEARSSL_SSL_BASIC')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0')
    add_definitions(-D'NDEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'_IR_ENABLE_DEFAULT_=false')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_HASH=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_NEC=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SONY=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SAMSUNG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_LG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_USE_MY_CONFIG')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'FP_IN_IROM')
    add_definitions(-D'PIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_ESPRESSIF_SDK22x_190703')
    add_definitions(-D'PIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_LWIP_HIGHER_BANDWIDTH')
    add_definitions(-D'VTABLES_IN_FLASH')
    add_definitions(-D'MIMETYPE_MINIMAL')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG=1')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_DEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_WIFI')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_HTTP_CLIENT')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_HTTP_UPDATE')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_HTTP_SERVER')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_UPDATER')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_OTA')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_TLS_MEM')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_VERSION=0.13.0-b3')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=80000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'__ets__')
    add_definitions(-D'ICACHE_FLASH')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BOARD=\"PLATFORMIO_D1_MINI\"')
    add_definitions(-D'FLASHMODE_DOUT')
    add_definitions(-D'LWIP_OPEN_SRC')
    add_definitions(-D'NONOSDK22x_190703=1')
    add_definitions(-D'__PLATFORMIO_BUILD_DEBUG__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wled00")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/EEPROM")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/DNSServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ArduinoOTA")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266mDNS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Wire")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WebServer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/d1_mini_debug/NeoPixelBus/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/d1_mini_debug/ESPAsyncUDP/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/d1_mini_debug/ESP Async WebServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Hash/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/d1_mini_debug/ESPAsyncTCP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WiFi/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/d1_mini_debug/IRremoteESP8266/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/d1_mini_debug/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPI")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/libc/xtensa-lx106-elf/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/cores/esp8266")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/lwip/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/variants/d1_mini")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266AVRISP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266HTTPClient/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266HTTPUpdateServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266LLMNR")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266NetBIOS")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266SSDP")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Ethernet/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/GDBStub/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SD/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SDFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPISlave/src")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/lib/gcc/xtensa-lx106-elf/4.8.2/include-fixed")

    add_definitions(-D'NDEBUG')

    add_definitions(-D'BTNPIN=1')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_VERSION=0.13.0-b3')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/sp501e/ESP Async WebServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Hash/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/sp501e/ESPAsyncTCP/src")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPI")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/include")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266AVRISP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266HTTPClient/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266HTTPUpdateServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266LLMNR")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266NetBIOS")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266SSDP")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266SdFat/src")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SDFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPISlave/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Servo/src")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/esp8266/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include/c++/4.8.2")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include/c++/4.8.2/xtensa-lx106-elf")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/lib/gcc/xtensa-lx106-elf/4.8.2/include-fixed")

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "wemos_shield_esp32")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ESP32_DEV')
    add_definitions(-D'MQTT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE=1024')
    add_definitions(-D'SECURE_CLIENT=SECURE_CLIENT_BEARSSL')
    add_definitions(-D'BEARSSL_SSL_BASIC')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0')
    add_definitions(-D'NDEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'_IR_ENABLE_DEFAULT_=false')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_HASH=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_NEC=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SONY=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SAMSUNG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_LG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_USE_MY_CONFIG')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'CONFIG_LITTLEFS_FOR_IDF_3_2')
    add_definitions(-D'CONFIG_ASYNC_TCP_USE_WDT=0')
    add_definitions(-D'LEDPIN=16')
    add_definitions(-D'RLYPIN=19')
    add_definitions(-D'BTNPIN=17')
    add_definitions(-D'IRPIN=18')
    add_definitions(-D'UWLED_USE_MY_CONFIG')
    add_definitions(-D'USERMOD_DALLASTEMPERATURE')
    add_definitions(-D'USERMOD_FOUR_LINE_DISPLAY')
    add_definitions(-D'TEMPERATURE_PIN=23')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_VERSION=0.13.0-b3')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP_PLATFORM')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=240000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'HAVE_CONFIG_H')
    add_definitions(-D'MBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE=\"mbedtls/esp_config.h\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_VARIANT=\"esp32\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BOARD=\"Espressif ESP32 Dev Module\"')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wled00")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/DNSServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/ArduinoOTA/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/ESPmDNS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/Update/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/WebServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/AsyncUDP/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/wemos_shield_esp32/U8g2/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/Wire/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/wemos_shield_esp32/OneWire")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/wemos_shield_esp32/NeoPixelBus/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/wemos_shield_esp32/ESP Async WebServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/WiFi/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/wemos_shield_esp32/AsyncTCP/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/wemos_shield_esp32/LittleFS_esp32/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/FS/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/wemos_shield_esp32/IRremoteESP8266/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/wemos_shield_esp32/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/SPI/src")

        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/wemos_shield_esp32/*.*

endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "travis_esp32")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ESP32_DEV')
    add_definitions(-D'MQTT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE=1024')
    add_definitions(-D'SECURE_CLIENT=SECURE_CLIENT_BEARSSL')
    add_definitions(-D'BEARSSL_SSL_BASIC')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0')
    add_definitions(-D'NDEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'_IR_ENABLE_DEFAULT_=false')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_HASH=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_NEC=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SONY=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SAMSUNG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_LG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_USE_MY_CONFIG')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'CONFIG_LITTLEFS_FOR_IDF_3_2')
    add_definitions(-D'CONFIG_ASYNC_TCP_USE_WDT=0')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG=1')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_DEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_WIFI')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_HTTP_CLIENT')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_HTTP_UPDATE')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_HTTP_SERVER')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_UPDATER')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_OTA')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_TLS_MEM')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_ENABLE_ADALIGHT')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_ENABLE_DMX')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_ENABLE_MQTT')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_ENABLE_WEBSOCKETS')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_VERSION=0.13.0-b3')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP_PLATFORM')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=240000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'HAVE_CONFIG_H')
    add_definitions(-D'MBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE=\"mbedtls/esp_config.h\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_VARIANT=\"esp32\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BOARD=\"Espressif ESP32 Dev Module\"')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/travis_esp32/AsyncTCP@1.1.1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/AzureIoT/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/BLE/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/BluetoothSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/ESP32/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/FFat/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/HTTPClient/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/HTTPUpdate/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/NetBIOS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/Preferences/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/SD/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/SD_MMC/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/SPIFFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/SimpleBLE/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/Ticker/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/WiFiClientSecure/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/xtensa-esp32-elf/include/c++/5.2.0")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/xtensa-esp32-elf/include/c++/5.2.0/xtensa-esp32-elf")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/lib/gcc/xtensa-esp32-elf/5.2.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/lib/gcc/xtensa-esp32-elf/5.2.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/xtensa-esp32-elf/include")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/travis_esp32/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "esp32dev")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ESP32_DEV')
    add_definitions(-D'MQTT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE=1024')
    add_definitions(-D'SECURE_CLIENT=SECURE_CLIENT_BEARSSL')
    add_definitions(-D'BEARSSL_SSL_BASIC')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0')
    add_definitions(-D'NDEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'_IR_ENABLE_DEFAULT_=false')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_HASH=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_NEC=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SONY=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SAMSUNG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_LG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_USE_MY_CONFIG')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'CONFIG_LITTLEFS_FOR_IDF_3_2')
    add_definitions(-D'CONFIG_ASYNC_TCP_USE_WDT=0')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_RELEASE_NAME=ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_VERSION=0.13.0-b3')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP_PLATFORM')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=240000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'HAVE_CONFIG_H')
    add_definitions(-D'MBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE=\"mbedtls/esp_config.h\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_VARIANT=\"esp32\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BOARD=\"Espressif ESP32 Dev Module\"')

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/AsyncUDP/src")

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "codm-controller-0.6")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ESP8266_ESP_WROOM_02')
    add_definitions(-D'MQTT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE=1024')
    add_definitions(-D'SECURE_CLIENT=SECURE_CLIENT_BEARSSL')
    add_definitions(-D'BEARSSL_SSL_BASIC')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0')
    add_definitions(-D'NDEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'_IR_ENABLE_DEFAULT_=false')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_HASH=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_NEC=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SONY=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SAMSUNG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_LG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_USE_MY_CONFIG')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'FP_IN_IROM')
    add_definitions(-D'PIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_ESPRESSIF_SDK22x_190703')
    add_definitions(-D'PIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_LWIP_HIGHER_BANDWIDTH')
    add_definitions(-D'VTABLES_IN_FLASH')
    add_definitions(-D'MIMETYPE_MINIMAL')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_VERSION=0.13.0-b3')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=80000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'__ets__')
    add_definitions(-D'ICACHE_FLASH')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BOARD=\"PLATFORMIO_ESP_WROOM_02\"')
    add_definitions(-D'FLASHMODE_DOUT')
    add_definitions(-D'LWIP_OPEN_SRC')
    add_definitions(-D'NONOSDK22x_190703=1')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wled00")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ArduinoOTA")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266mDNS/src")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WebServer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/codm-controller-0.6/NeoPixelBus/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/codm-controller-0.6/ESPAsyncUDP/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/codm-controller-0.6/ESP Async WebServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Hash/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/codm-controller-0.6/ESPAsyncTCP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WiFi/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/codm-controller-0.6/IRremoteESP8266/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/codm-controller-0.6/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPI")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/libc/xtensa-lx106-elf/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/cores/esp8266")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/lwip/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/variants/nodemcu")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266AVRISP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266HTTPClient/src")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266SdFat/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WiFiMesh/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266httpUpdate/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Ethernet/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/GDBStub/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SD/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SDFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPISlave/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/TFT_Touch_Shield_V2")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Ticker/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/esp8266/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include/c++/4.8.2")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include/c++/4.8.2/xtensa-lx106-elf")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/lib/gcc/xtensa-lx106-elf/4.8.2/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/lib/gcc/xtensa-lx106-elf/4.8.2/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/codm-controller-0.6/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "esp8285_5CH_H801")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ESP8266_ESP01')
    add_definitions(-D'MQTT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE=1024')
    add_definitions(-D'SECURE_CLIENT=SECURE_CLIENT_BEARSSL')
    add_definitions(-D'BEARSSL_SSL_BASIC')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0')
    add_definitions(-D'NDEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'_IR_ENABLE_DEFAULT_=false')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_HASH=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_NEC=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SONY=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SAMSUNG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_LG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_USE_MY_CONFIG')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'FP_IN_IROM')
    add_definitions(-D'PIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_ESPRESSIF_SDK22x_190703')
    add_definitions(-D'PIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_LWIP_HIGHER_BANDWIDTH')
    add_definitions(-D'VTABLES_IN_FLASH')
    add_definitions(-D'MIMETYPE_MINIMAL')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_DISABLE_OTA')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_VERSION=0.13.0-b3')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=80000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'__ets__')
    add_definitions(-D'ICACHE_FLASH')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BOARD=\"PLATFORMIO_ESP8285\"')
    add_definitions(-D'FLASHMODE_DOUT')
    add_definitions(-D'LWIP_OPEN_SRC')
    add_definitions(-D'NONOSDK22x_190703=1')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wled00")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/EEPROM")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/DNSServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ArduinoOTA")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266mDNS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Wire")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WebServer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp8285_5CH_H801/NeoPixelBus/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp8285_5CH_H801/ESPAsyncUDP/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp8285_5CH_H801/ESP Async WebServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Hash/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp8285_5CH_H801/ESPAsyncTCP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WiFi/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp8285_5CH_H801/IRremoteESP8266/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp8285_5CH_H801/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPI")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/libc/xtensa-lx106-elf/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/cores/esp8266")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/lwip/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/variants/generic")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266AVRISP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266HTTPClient/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266HTTPUpdateServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266LLMNR")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266NetBIOS")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266SSDP")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266SdFat/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WiFiMesh/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266httpUpdate/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Ethernet/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/GDBStub/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SD/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SDFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPISlave/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/TFT_Touch_Shield_V2")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Ticker/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/esp8266/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include/c++/4.8.2")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include/c++/4.8.2/xtensa-lx106-elf")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/lib/gcc/xtensa-lx106-elf/4.8.2/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include")

    add_definitions(-D'BEARSSL_SSL_BASIC')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0')
    add_definitions(-D'NDEBUG')

    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_LG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_USE_MY_CONFIG')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'FP_IN_IROM')
    add_definitions(-D'PIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_ESPRESSIF_SDK22x_190703')
    add_definitions(-D'PIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_LWIP_HIGHER_BANDWIDTH')
    add_definitions(-D'VTABLES_IN_FLASH')
    add_definitions(-D'MIMETYPE_MINIMAL')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_VERSION=0.13.0-b3')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=80000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'__ets__')
    add_definitions(-D'ICACHE_FLASH')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')

    add_definitions(-D'LWIP_OPEN_SRC')
    add_definitions(-D'NONOSDK22x_190703=1')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wled00")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ArduinoOTA")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266mDNS/src")

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec_wifi_kit_8/ESPAsyncUDP/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec_wifi_kit_8/ESP Async WebServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Hash/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec_wifi_kit_8/ESPAsyncTCP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WiFi/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec_wifi_kit_8/IRremoteESP8266/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec_wifi_kit_8/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPI")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/libc/xtensa-lx106-elf/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/cores/esp8266")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/lwip/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/variants/d1_mini")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266AVRISP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266HTTPClient/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266HTTPUpdateServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266LLMNR")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266NetBIOS")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266SSDP")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266SdFat/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WiFiMesh/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266httpUpdate/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Ethernet/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/GDBStub/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SD/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SDFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPISlave/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/TFT_Touch_Shield_V2")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/esp8266/src")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include/c++/4.8.2/xtensa-lx106-elf")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/lib/gcc/xtensa-lx106-elf/4.8.2/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/lib/gcc/xtensa-lx106-elf/4.8.2/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include")

        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec_wifi_kit_8/*.*

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "sp511e")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ESP8266_ESP_WROOM_02')
    add_definitions(-D'MQTT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE=1024')
    add_definitions(-D'SECURE_CLIENT=SECURE_CLIENT_BEARSSL')
    add_definitions(-D'BEARSSL_SSL_BASIC')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0')
    add_definitions(-D'NDEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'_IR_ENABLE_DEFAULT_=false')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_HASH=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_NEC=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SONY=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SAMSUNG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_LG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_USE_MY_CONFIG')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'FP_IN_IROM')
    add_definitions(-D'PIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_ESPRESSIF_SDK22x_190703')
    add_definitions(-D'PIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_LWIP_HIGHER_BANDWIDTH')
    add_definitions(-D'VTABLES_IN_FLASH')
    add_definitions(-D'MIMETYPE_MINIMAL')
    add_definitions(-D'LEDPIN=3')
    add_definitions(-D'BTNPIN=2')
    add_definitions(-D'IRPIN=5')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_MAX_BUTTONS=3')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_VERSION=0.13.0-b3')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=80000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'__ets__')
    add_definitions(-D'ICACHE_FLASH')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BOARD=\"PLATFORMIO_ESP_WROOM_02\"')
    add_definitions(-D'FLASHMODE_DOUT')
    add_definitions(-D'LWIP_OPEN_SRC')
    add_definitions(-D'NONOSDK22x_190703=1')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wled00")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/DNSServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ArduinoOTA")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266mDNS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Wire")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WebServer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/sp511e/NeoPixelBus/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/sp511e/ESPAsyncUDP/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/sp511e/ESP Async WebServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Hash/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/sp511e/ESPAsyncTCP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WiFi/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/sp511e/IRremoteESP8266/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/sp511e/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPI")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/libc/xtensa-lx106-elf/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/cores/esp8266")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/lwip/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/variants/nodemcu")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266AVRISP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266HTTPClient/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266HTTPUpdateServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266LLMNR")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266NetBIOS")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266SSDP")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266SdFat/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WiFiMesh/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266httpUpdate/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Ethernet/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/GDBStub/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SD/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SDFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPISlave/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/TFT_Touch_Shield_V2")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Ticker/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/esp8266/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include/c++/4.8.2")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include/c++/4.8.2/xtensa-lx106-elf")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/lib/gcc/xtensa-lx106-elf/4.8.2/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/lib/gcc/xtensa-lx106-elf/4.8.2/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/sp511e/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "esp01_1m_full")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ESP8266_ESP01')
    add_definitions(-D'MQTT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE=1024')
    add_definitions(-D'SECURE_CLIENT=SECURE_CLIENT_BEARSSL')
    add_definitions(-D'BEARSSL_SSL_BASIC')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0')
    add_definitions(-D'NDEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'_IR_ENABLE_DEFAULT_=false')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_HASH=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_NEC=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SONY=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SAMSUNG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_LG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_USE_MY_CONFIG')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'FP_IN_IROM')
    add_definitions(-D'PIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_ESPRESSIF_SDK22x_190703')
    add_definitions(-D'PIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_LWIP_HIGHER_BANDWIDTH')
    add_definitions(-D'VTABLES_IN_FLASH')
    add_definitions(-D'MIMETYPE_MINIMAL')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_RELEASE_NAME=ESP01')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_DISABLE_OTA')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_VERSION=0.13.0-b3')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=80000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'__ets__')
    add_definitions(-D'ICACHE_FLASH')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BOARD=\"PLATFORMIO_ESP01_1M\"')
    add_definitions(-D'FLASHMODE_DOUT')
    add_definitions(-D'LWIP_OPEN_SRC')
    add_definitions(-D'NONOSDK22x_190703=1')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wled00")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/EEPROM")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/DNSServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ArduinoOTA")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266mDNS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Wire")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WebServer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp01_1m_full/NeoPixelBus/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp01_1m_full/ESPAsyncUDP/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp01_1m_full/ESP Async WebServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Hash/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp01_1m_full/ESPAsyncTCP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WiFi/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp01_1m_full/IRremoteESP8266/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp01_1m_full/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPI")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/libc/xtensa-lx106-elf/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/cores/esp8266")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/lwip/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/variants/generic")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266AVRISP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266HTTPClient/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266HTTPUpdateServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266LLMNR")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266NetBIOS")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266SSDP")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266SdFat/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WiFiMesh/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266httpUpdate/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Ethernet/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/GDBStub/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SD/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SDFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPISlave/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/TFT_Touch_Shield_V2")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Ticker/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/esp8266/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include/c++/4.8.2")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include/c++/4.8.2/xtensa-lx106-elf")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/lib/gcc/xtensa-lx106-elf/4.8.2/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/lib/gcc/xtensa-lx106-elf/4.8.2/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp01_1m_full/*.*
    )

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPI")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266HTTPClient/src")

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "travis_esp8266")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ESP8266_WEMOS_D1MINI')
    add_definitions(-D'MQTT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE=1024')
    add_definitions(-D'SECURE_CLIENT=SECURE_CLIENT_BEARSSL')
    add_definitions(-D'BEARSSL_SSL_BASIC')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0')
    add_definitions(-D'NDEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'_IR_ENABLE_DEFAULT_=false')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_HASH=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_NEC=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SONY=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SAMSUNG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_LG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_USE_MY_CONFIG')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP8266')
    add_definitions(-D'FP_IN_IROM')
    add_definitions(-D'PIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_ESPRESSIF_SDK22x_190703')
    add_definitions(-D'PIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_LWIP_HIGHER_BANDWIDTH')
    add_definitions(-D'VTABLES_IN_FLASH')
    add_definitions(-D'MIMETYPE_MINIMAL')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG=1')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_DEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_WIFI')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_HTTP_CLIENT')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_HTTP_UPDATE')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_HTTP_SERVER')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_UPDATER')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_ESP_OTA')
    add_definitions(-D'DEBUG_TLS_MEM')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_ENABLE_ADALIGHT')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_ENABLE_DMX')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_ENABLE_MQTT')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_ENABLE_WEBSOCKETS')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_VERSION=0.13.0-b3')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=80000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'__ets__')
    add_definitions(-D'ICACHE_FLASH')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BOARD=\"PLATFORMIO_D1_MINI\"')
    add_definitions(-D'FLASHMODE_DOUT')
    add_definitions(-D'LWIP_OPEN_SRC')
    add_definitions(-D'NONOSDK22x_190703=1')
    add_definitions(-D'__PLATFORMIO_BUILD_DEBUG__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wled00")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/EEPROM")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/DNSServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ArduinoOTA")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266mDNS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Wire")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WebServer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/travis_esp8266/NeoPixelBus/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/travis_esp8266/ESPAsyncUDP/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/travis_esp8266/ESP Async WebServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Hash/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/travis_esp8266/ESPAsyncTCP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WiFi/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/travis_esp8266/IRremoteESP8266/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/travis_esp8266/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPI")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/libc/xtensa-lx106-elf/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/cores/esp8266")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/tools/sdk/lwip/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/variants/d1_mini")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266AVRISP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266HTTPClient/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266HTTPUpdateServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266LLMNR")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266NetBIOS")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266SSDP")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266SdFat/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266WiFiMesh/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/ESP8266httpUpdate/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Ethernet/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/GDBStub/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SD/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SDFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/SPISlave/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/TFT_Touch_Shield_V2")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/Ticker/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif8266/libraries/esp8266/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include/c++/4.8.2")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include/c++/4.8.2/xtensa-lx106-elf")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/lib/gcc/xtensa-lx106-elf/4.8.2/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/lib/gcc/xtensa-lx106-elf/4.8.2/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa/xtensa-lx106-elf/include")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/travis_esp8266/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "esp32_eth")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ESP32_POE')
    add_definitions(-D'MQTT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE=1024')
    add_definitions(-D'SECURE_CLIENT=SECURE_CLIENT_BEARSSL')
    add_definitions(-D'BEARSSL_SSL_BASIC')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0')
    add_definitions(-D'NDEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'_IR_ENABLE_DEFAULT_=false')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_HASH=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_NEC=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SONY=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SAMSUNG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_LG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_USE_MY_CONFIG')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'CONFIG_LITTLEFS_FOR_IDF_3_2')
    add_definitions(-D'CONFIG_ASYNC_TCP_USE_WDT=0')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_RELEASE_NAME=ESP32_Ethernet')
    add_definitions(-D'RLYPIN=-1')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_USE_ETHERNET')
    add_definitions(-D'BTNPIN=-1')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_VERSION=0.13.0-b3')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP_PLATFORM')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=240000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'HAVE_CONFIG_H')
    add_definitions(-D'MBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE=\"mbedtls/esp_config.h\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_VARIANT=\"esp32-poe\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BOARD=\"OLIMEX ESP32-PoE\"')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wled00")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/DNSServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/ArduinoOTA/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/ESPmDNS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/Update/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/Wire/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/WebServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/AsyncUDP/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp32_eth/NeoPixelBus/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp32_eth/ESP Async WebServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/WiFi/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp32_eth/AsyncTCP/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp32_eth/LittleFS_esp32/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/FS/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp32_eth/IRremoteESP8266/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/esp32_eth/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/SPI/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/tools/sdk/include/config")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/tools/sdk/include/app_trace")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/tools/sdk/include/app_update")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32@3.10004.210126/libraries/WiFiClientSecure/src")

    add_definitions(-D'NDEBUG')

    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_NEC=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SONY=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_SAMSUNG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'DECODE_LG=true')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_USE_MY_CONFIG')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32')

    add_definitions(-D'CONFIG_ASYNC_TCP_USE_WDT=0')
    add_definitions(-D'LEDPIN=27')
    add_definitions(-D'BTNPIN=39')
    add_definitions(-D'WLED_VERSION=0.13.0-b3')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP_PLATFORM')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=240000000L')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/m5atom/LittleFS_esp32/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/FS/src")

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/m5atom/FastLED/src")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/tools/sdk/include/lwip")
